document_data.name: ''Spider's Kiss''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Spider's Kiss''''' was an [[enchanted]] [[scimitar]] that once belonged to the King of Spiders of [[Westgate]].
document_data.Powers: The blade of this scimitar was constantly coated with potent dark oozing [[spider]] [[poison]]. Additionally, the ''Spider's Kiss'' possessed a ''+2'' enchantment that increased the damage and guided the wielder's hand towards their target.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1374}}, the so-called King of Spiders â€“ [[Sirachna]], gained entrance to a home on Westgate's [[Market Triangle]] from a cavern underneath. His arachnid pets ended up murdering a family who lived inside, leaving them haunting the home as restless [[ghost]]s. Some said the King of Spiders was killed by an adventurer, accompanied by [[Charissa Maernos]], [[Mantides]], and [[Rinara]], who claimed the ''Spider's Kiss'' and several other magic items.
